docs.lead_paragraph: If a mere nature faker had been in the Bronx Zoological Gardens yesterday morning instead of a solemn keeper of unimpeachable veracity he would have gained enough facts about the humanity of buffalo to fill several books for the public schools. In it would have be material for a thrilling romance to prove that the American buffalo knows what mother love is and carries it as far as you like.

headline.main: THE BENIGNANT BUFFALO.; More News of Interest to Nature Fakers from the Bronx Zoo.

docs.lead_paragraph: W.H. Carey, owned by R.F. Carman, came out of his race in the mile and a quarter handicap on Monday so sore and lame that it was said yesterday the horse practically has broken down.

headline.main: SHEEPSHEAD BAY NOTES.; Star Shoot Colts Bring Good Prices. AUTO ENTRIES COME SLOWLY. Former Vanderbilt Cup Driver Will Compete for Glidden Trophy. MAY FORCE LIQUIDATION. If Colby Suit Wins Equitable Trust Assets Will Probably Be Sold.

docs.abstract: suit may force liquidation of Equitable assets
